name: Ponyta
flavorText: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything flat in moments.

strengths: Flame Tail deals impressive 30 damage for just 2 Fire Energy
Smash Kick offers flexibility using any Energy type for 20 damage
Evolves into Rapidash which has even better offensive capabilities
Low retreat cost of 1 provides good mobility
Strong against Grass and Steel-type Pokemon
weaknesses: Low 40 HP makes it vulnerable to one-hit knockouts
Water weakness is problematic with common Water Pokemon in format
No resistance to help with defensive matchups
Both attacks cost 2 Energy, requiring setup time
Cannot use Smash Kick and Flame Tail interchangeably efficiently
synergies: Use PlusPower with Flame Tail to reach 40 damage and secure more KOs
Energy Removal can slow down Water opponents while Ponyta sets up
Pair with Blaine's training cards in themed decks for damage boosts
Evolve into Rapidash when facing tougher opponents or after taking damage
counters: Squirtle - Water weakness and Bubble can be devastating
Staryu - Water typing and decent HP make this difficult
Poliwag - Water Gun and type advantage favor Poliwag
